nodes.bodyText: The value looks contrary to the variable name.

The same constant is mentioned in [1]. Since it is in the JDBC constants, it is not the best practice to use it in AD/LDAP constants. Based on that created a common one.
[1] 
  
    
      carbon-kernel/core/org.wso2.carbon.user.core/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/user/core/jdbc/caseinsensitive/JDBCCaseInsensitiveConstants.java
    
    
         Line 250
      in
      eaec36a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static final String CASE_SENSITIVE_USERNAME = "CaseInsensitiveUsername";
Even in that case, the variable name and the value sound contrary to one another. Since we are adding it anew here, better if we correct it IMO. @madurangasiriwardena any input?
